mapper.select:
SELECT CE.id, CE.allDay, CE.end, CE.lastUpdateDate, CE.lastUpdateUserId, CE.linkUrl, CE.type, CE.vcid, CE.classValue, CE.start, CE.styleValue, CE.title, CE.topicId, CE.topicType, CE.createDate, CE.createUserId, CE.remark, CE.editable, CE.attributes FROM CAL_CALENDAR_EVENT CE WHERE
AND CE.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAL_CALENDAR_EVENT ( id, allDay, end, lastUpdateDate, lastUpdateUserId, linkUrl, type, vcid, classValue, start, styleValue, title, topicId, topicType, createDate, createUserId, remark, editable, attributes ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{allDay}, #{end}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{lastUpdateUserId}, #{linkUrl}, #{type}, #{vcid}, #{classValue}, #{start}, #{styleValue}, #{title}, #{topicId}, #{topicType}, #{createDate}, #{createUserId}, #{remark}, #{editable}, #{attributes} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM CAL_CALENDAR_EVENT WHERE
AND id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE CAL_CALENDAR_EVENT
allDay = #{allDay,javaType=boolean},
end = #{end,javaType=java.util.Date},
lastUpdateDate = #{lastUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
lastUpdateUserId = #{lastUpdateUserId,javaType=java.lang.String},
linkUrl = #{linkUrl,javaType=java.lang.String},
type = #{type,javaType=com.tx.local.calendar.model.CalendarEventTypeEnum},
vcid = #{vcid,javaType=java.lang.String},
classValue = #{classValue,javaType=java.lang.String},
start = #{start,javaType=java.util.Date},
styleValue = #{styleValue,javaType=java.lang.String},
title = #{title,javaType=java.lang.String},
topicId = #{topicId,javaType=java.lang.String},
topicType = #{topicType,javaType=com.tx.local.calendar.model.CalendarEventTopicTypeEnum},
remark = #{remark,javaType=java.lang.String},
editable = #{editable,javaType=boolean},
attributes = #{attributes,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE
AND id = #{id}
